title: Doctor Who - Big Finish Podcast 02 - 02-12-2008
description:
Big Finish Podcast - Episode 2
(12/02/2008)
In this week&#039;s Big Finish Podcast regular director Barnaby Edwards takes a gander at some of our current and future releases, with clips from Max Warp, The Phantom of the Opera and The Haunting of Thomas Brewster. There&#039;s a report from Paul Wilson on the state of the web site upgrade, plus some pearls of wisdom from Anna Massey. Also, Barnaby responds to your feedback and discusses our plans for releasing downloadable Music Soundtracks from various Big Finish plays.
